model

Class ModelKoie

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ModelKoie

  • public class ModelKoie
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for storing data retrieved from the queries in database.DbKoie and database.DbEquipmentList

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor for only setting a koie name to the object

      Constructor for constructing static info on a koie

                 int number_of_beds,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 java.lang.String image)
        Constructor for constructing static info on a koie
        Parameters:
        koie_name - The koie name
        number_of_beds - Number of beds on the koie
        description - Short description of the koie
        image - Image URL of the koie

    • Method Detail

      • setSmoke

        public void setSmoke(int smoke)
        Set the current status on the smoke detector
        Parameters:
        smoke - 0 or 1. 0 = works, 1= broken

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(int status)
        Set the general status on the koie
        Parameters:
        status - 0 = everything good, 1 = forgotten, 2 = defects (+maybe forgotten)

      • setWood

        public void setWood(int wood)
        Set the wood status on the koie
        Parameters:
        wood - 1 = "0-15", 2 = "15-30", 3 = "Mer enn 30".

      • setForgotten

        public void setForgotten(int forgotten)
        Set the forgotten status on the koie
        Parameters:
        forgotten - 0 = all good, 1 = something forgotten.
